content: बंधुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बंध्-उरच्] {@--1@} Undulating, wavy, uneven; <ls>Śi. 7. 34</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 42</ls>, <ls>U. 6. 25</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6. 30.</ls> {@--2@} Bent, inclined, bowed; बंधुरगात्रि <ls>R. 13. 47</ls>; (= संनतांगि). {@--3@} Crooked, curved. {@--4@} Pleasing, handsome, beautiful, lovely; कथं नु तं बंधुरकोमलांगुलिं <ls>Ś. 6. 12</ls> (where it may mean ‘undulating’ also); समस्तशास्त्रस्मृतिबंधुरे मुखे <ls>K. 3.</ls> {@--5@} Deaf. {@--6@} Injurious, mischievous. --रः {@--1@} A goose. {@--2@} A crane. {@--3@} A drug. {@--4@} An oil-cake. {@--5@} The vulva. {@--6@} The बंधुजीव tree. --राः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}|{%<ab>pl.</ab>%}) Parched corn or meal thereof. --रा An unchaste woman. --रं A diadem.
